message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this offer represents a great opportunity to acquire it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we try $9,500? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my limits.
